name: RETROFUTURECATS: Admeowstrators of Hell
description:
You are currently in the admeownistration of Hell, and have to complete mission from your all mighty boss : "Hello Kitty". Complete Missions and Kill Ennemies in this fast FPS-futuristic-demonic game in order to have the best score possible ! 

Please Submit your score if you think you've done well enough to impress the boss !

Controls : 

-Controller

RB to Shoot, X to Reload.

-Mouse/Keyboard :

Mouse to shoot, R to reload.

We had a lot of fun making this game together, and we hope you like it! Made during the Ludum Dare 51, which theme was every 10 seconds
